channel.title: Navigation on The Sovereign Library

item.title: Library
item.description:
The Library holds the operational knowledge of the sovereign system.

Core Sections

  • Patterns — Behavioral and structural patterns observed in the field
  • Protocols — Operational procedures and systematic approaches
  • Philosophy — Foundational principles and conceptual frameworks
  • Field Tests — Real-world applications and validation logs

System Infrastructure

  • History — Timeline, events, and system evolution
  • Relationships — Social architecture and connections
  • System — Metadata, analysis, and technical infrastructure
  • Council — AI Council rules and engagement protocols

item.title: Life Layer
item.description:
This surface points to what is lived, trained, and embodied.

  • Third Layer
  • Relationships
  • Field Tests
